feed.title: Track Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome creative tech events from around the world

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Feb 17, 2020
entry.content:
Netherlands / Eindhoven

  • STRP - STRP Festival is one of the largest art & technology (e-culture) festivals in Europe where music, art and technology meet. (April)

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Jan 19, 2020
entry.content:
Netherlands / Amsterdam

  • FITC Amsterdam - 2 day event about design, technology and cool shit. (February)

France / Paris

  • Immersive Art Festival - The Atelier des Lumières is a digital art centre where immersive exhibitions dedicated to the greatest artists in the history of art and more contemporary creations are projected. (October)

Spain / Barcelona

  • Offf Barcelona - Conference for offline/online designers, motion designers, thinkers, sound designers, graphic designers, theorists, developers, professionals and students. (April)
  • Sonar - Music, creativity & technology. (June)

Austria / Linz

  • Ars Electronica Festival - Festival for art, technology and society. (September)

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Jan 13, 2020
entry.content:
USA / San Francisco

  • CODAME ART+TECH Festival - Explores the manifold dimensions of SPACE with an incredible lineup schedule, including nightlife installations and performances, a variety of workshops, and community gathering art+tech salon to close off the Festival. (October)

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Dec 11, 2019
entry.content:
Germany / Hamburg

  • Wirefly - The first tech & arts festival of its kind in Germany ⪢ 4 days of ✓ talks ✓ music ✓ events ✓ food ✓ camping - all that and more at a unique venue on the beach! (August)

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Nov 23, 2019
entry.content:
Germany / Düsseldorf, Berlin and Munich

  • Beyond tellerrand - An affordable event about web design, development, creativity, design and much more with multiple events throughout the year.

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Nov 01, 2019
entry.content:
Denmark / Copenhagen

  • Creating Coding Copenhagen - Meetup group for people of all skill levels interested in generative art, machine learning for creative purpose or tech-based art in general.

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Oct 15, 2019
entry.content:
UK / London

  • Algorithmic Art - Monthly meetup in London and other meetups in Cornwall to inspire artists to learn to code, technologists to explore art, and first time coders to get started in fun way that stimulates the senses.

Netherlands / Amsterdam

  • Creative Coding Amsterdam - Meetup for people of all levels interested in all creative aspects of computer programming.

Sweden / Stockholm

  • Creative Coding Stockholm - Meetup group for anyone interested in creating art using programming languages.

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Oct 11, 2019
entry.content:
Czech Republic / Prague

  • Signal Festival - 4 day themed festival showcasing digital installations across the city. (October)

USA / Pittsburgh

  • p5.js Contributors Conference - Whilst most work happens online, every now and then artists, designers, developers and educators get together to advance the p5.js project.

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Oct 10, 2019
entry.content:
France / Lyon

  • Micro Meso Macro - Exploring the frontiers of data representation (November)

Slovakia / Bratislava

  • Sensorium Festival - 3 day festival for designers, creative directors, technologists, architects, innovators, artists and scientists interested in humane technology. (June)

entry.title: Awesome Creative Tech Events Updates on Oct 06, 2019
entry.content:
UK / London

  • London Creative Coding Meetup - Bimonthly meetup aiming to gather like minded creatives from all backgrounds.
  • Visualising Data London - Bimonthly meetup for people who design, write code, draw or like to think about data visualisation.
  • Encode - 2 day data viz conference. (September)

UK / Eastnor

  • EMF Camp - Camping festival for hackers, artists, geeks, crafters, scientists, and engineers. (July)

Netherlands / Amsterdam

  • Interactive storytelling Meetup - For everyone working with, or interested in, interactive and/or digital storytelling.
  • The Next Web - Europe's largest tech festival. (June)

France / Paris

  • Grow - The first parisian event dedicated to advanced creative coding. (November)

Germany / Berlin

  • Creative Code Berlin Meetup - Diverse community of people interested in the use of computing skills for artistic expression.

Spain / Barcelona

  • Mutek Barcelona - Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (March)

Italy / Milan

  • Digital Design Days - 3 day event for the digital design industry. (October)

Canada / Montréal

  • Mutek Montréal - Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (March)

Canada / Toronto

  • FITC Toronto - 3 day celebration of the best the world has to offer in design, web development, media and innovation in creative technologies. (April)

USA / Minneapolis

  • Eyeo Festival - Festival for Artists, data designers, creative coders, AI explorers, storytellers, tool & platform developers, and researchers all. (June)

Mexico / Pittsburgh

  • Mutek Mexico - Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (November)

Argentina / Buenos Aires

  • Mutek Buenos Aires - Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (September)

Japan / Tokyo

  • Mutek Tokyo - Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (December)
